items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars pretty, washable and comforable
items.body: fits perfectly and hangs nicely...the fabric is soft, warm and comfortable and the color is true to the picture...it will make a great Christmas dress for church Read more
items.author: Lynn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for many occasions including church and work.
items.body: This cute dress has drawn many compliments from friends and family. The material is soft, washes well, and comes out of the dryer wrinkle free. I did not need a slip with it because it was thick enough not to see through. The fit was great. Even though it was a little long for my taste, it still looked nice. Read more
items.author: Grand 1

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it but thin
items.body: I love the fit, the feel of the fabric, and the style. I do think the fabric is very light weight but not sheer. Very comfortable. Read more
items.author: Rlee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress at a reasonable price!
items.body: Very perfect dress! Love the length and the way it flows when moving! The fit is true to size and it’s extremely comfortable. I can visualize wearing this for many occasions! Read more
items.author: Shannon Flowers

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It didn’t work for me.
items.body: I used the sizing chart to decide what size to order, so I think the dress would have been okay for someone with a different body type. On me, the dress draped wrong. I have a short waist, and the dress’s waist was too low, especially with the volume of skirt material, which seemed to weigh it down farther. Read more
items.author: Louise Neal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a beautiful dress
items.body: Reviews for this dress were mixed, and this is what I found when it arrived. It is true to size and is made of high quality material that is not see through, it is not thin, and it does not wrinkle or smell. It is not shapless. I purchased the burgundy dress with a small flower print, so I bought a stretchy, 3 inch wide belt in burgundy, which made it blend with the dress and not appear to be overly wide, and it also covered up the short waist on the dress.. It is beautiful. The colors are as shown. It did not fade or shrink when I washed and hung it to dry. Read more
items.author: G. Gourley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality and so affordable!
items.body: I now have three of these dresses. They fit perfectly and wash up so easily. Very comfortable and can be dressed up with a belt and or jewelry. Read more
items.author: Kathy Anderson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my Elphaba costume
items.body: This worked out perfectly for my Halloween costume. I got a medium and it fit perfectly. I'm only 5' tall, and this was not too long on me. Also, it has POCKETS! Very helpful when I was running around putting last minute touches on my display. It's soft and comfy - I can see myself wearing this around the house. I would even wear it out, but it's not really my style. I will hold on to this for Halloween in general - it's very versatile and breathable. Read more
items.author: G. Rose

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy 2, Navy Floral, Pink Floral, Leopard Print, Ethnic Style, Pat2, Black, Camel, White Floral, Green Print, Dark Green, Red, Blue Black Small Floral, Christmas Snow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
